content: {"locationId": "6718", "organizationId": "3407", "name": "Mary's Chapel United Methodist Church (Physical Address)", "address1": "63343 Jones Creek Road", "address2": null, "city": "Angie", "state": "LA", "zipCode": "70426", "country": null, "phone": null, "phoneExt": null, "website": null, "latitude": "30.89898", "longitude": "-89.82538", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Usually, Mary's Chapel United Methodist Church/Second Harvest Food Serve is opened the first Wednesday of each month only from 8:00 am until all food is served.  However, because of Ash Wednesday and Madi Gras Holidays, food will be served on the 19 of March.  Hopefully, we will return to our regular first Wednesday schedule in April.  We are located at 63343 Jones Creek Road in Varnado, Louisiana, 70467.    Our mission is to prevent food disparities in Washington Parish by helping Second Harvest Food Bank distribute food to all those in need. ", "notes": "Our next distribution is Wednesday, March 19, 2025, starting at 8:00 am. Remember to bring proof of identification. If you are not pre-certified, please bring proof of identification, proof of residence, and proof of income. You will also need to bring a box or bag to carry your grocery home, if certified.   Keep in mind that our first Wednesday date changed because of the Ash Wednesday and the Madi Gras holidays. Hopefully, we will return to the first Wednesday in April.", "contactName": "Glory Davis", "contactPhone": "985-570-7306", "contactEmail": "Gloglo1944@outlook.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 38, "regionName": "Second Harvest Food Bank Feeding South Louisiana", "logoBlobNameSmall": "e342973b-0cc0-4794-b3f9-080cdb5ba8df.png", "website": "https://no-hunger.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
